name: Glide
description: Glide is a no-code platform that enables users to create custom, AI-powered business apps from spreadsheets without coding.
longDescription: Glide is a no-code software development platform that allows users, regardless of technical expertise, to transform data from spreadsheets into powerful, custom mobile and web applications. Founded in 2018, Glide’s mission is to democratize app development by making it accessible, collaborative, and efficient, enabling businesses to build apps 10-100x faster than traditional methods. The platform integrates with data sources like Google Sheets, Airtable, and BigQuery, offering a spreadsheet-like interface for data management and drag-and-drop tools for app customization. It serves a wide range of industries, from small businesses creating cost-effective tools to enterprises building scalable, secure applications. Glide also incorporates AI to automate tasks like text extraction and content generation, enhancing app functionality. By streamlining development, Glide empowers teams to create tailored solutions for CRM, inventory management, and dashboards in days, not months.
features: Drag-and-drop interface allows users to build apps without coding, simplifying the development process for non-technical users.
Integration with data sources like Google Sheets, Airtable, and SQL enables seamless data syncing and management.
AI-powered automation extracts text, converts data, and generates content to enhance app functionality.
Customizable templates provide a starting point for rapid app creation tailored to specific business needs.
Real-time data visualization creates intuitive dashboards to track key business metrics.
Workflow automation enables users to create complex, logic-based processes without coding expertise.
Mobile and desktop compatibility ensures apps are user-friendly across devices without downloads.
Glide Big Tables supports up to 10 million rows for high-scale data management.
Secure authentication with SSO and role-based access controls ensures enterprise-grade data protection.
Instant app deployment allows businesses to share apps with users via links or QR codes.
Custom portals provide a centralized hub for customers, employees, or investors to access key information.

faqs.question: What is Glide used for?
faqs.answer: Glide is used to create custom, data-driven mobile and web apps without coding, ideal for business tools like CRMs, dashboards, and inventory systems.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use Glide?
faqs.answer: No, Glide’s no-code platform uses a drag-and-drop interface and spreadsheet-like data management, making it accessible to non-technical users.

faqs.question: Does Glide offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glide provides a free plan with essential features and a 30-day free trial of its Business Plan for advanced functionality.

faqs.question: What data sources can Glide connect to?
faqs.answer: Glide integrates with Google Sheets, Excel, Airtable, BigQuery, and its proprietary Glide Big Tables for seamless data management.

faqs.question: How secure is Glide for enterprise use?
faqs.answer: Glide offers encryption, SSO, role-based access controls, and compliance with standards like GDPR and SOC 2 Type 2 for enterprise security.

faqs.question: Can I customize apps built with Glide?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glide provides customizable templates, themes, and drag-and-drop tools to tailor apps to specific business needs.

faqs.question: How fast can I build an app with Glide?
faqs.answer: With Glide, users can create and deploy apps in days or even hours, significantly faster than traditional development methods.

faqs.question: Does Glide support AI features?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glide AI automates tasks like text extraction, content generation, and data structuring, selecting optimal models for each use case.
